topImage.content: By participating you help map the spread of infectious diseases, allowing us to quickly see the current situation.

requiredSurveys.title: Questionnaires to be completed
requiredSurveys.info: The different questionnaires for the study can be found here.
requiredSurveys.successMsg: Thank you! You have completed all questionnaires. We hope to hear from you again next week. In case you want to provide new information sooner, you can retake the questionnaire in a few hours.

optionalSurveys.title: Change your background or vaccination information
optionalSurveys.info: If your situation has changed, you can fill again the background or vaccination questionnaires below. Unfortunately, we cannot show you the information you entered last time, or let you change your answers to specific questions only.
